events.message: The insured reported an auto accident involving their vehicle colliding with a tree on April 30th, 2024.
The claim was reviewed and categorized as an auto accident involving vehicle damage caused by a collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the accident claim and to guide the customer through the process.
The customer was sent an acknowledgment notification confirming receipt of the auto accident claim.
The agent requested photos of the damaged vehicle, the police report, and the driver's license to proceed.
Customer submitted all requested documents including photos, police report, and identification successfully.
The claim investigation was initiated to verify damages and assess liability for the auto collision.
Investigation concluded confirming the extent of vehicle damage and the circumstances of the accident.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover repair costs for the damage sustained in the auto accident.
Customer responded positively accepting the proposed settlement for the vehicle repairs.
The claim was officially approved for payment to cover the auto accident repair expenses.
Payment was successfully issued to the customerâ€™s repair shop to initiate vehicle repairs.
The claim was closed after confirmation of repair completion and customer satisfaction.
The finalized claim documents and records were archived for future reference and compliance.
